document.full_text: a federal jury on tuesday found a mexican drug trafficker guilty of second degree murder for killing a u.s. border patrol agent by deliberately swerving a truck at him in a dash back to mexico to escape arrest.
document.title: jury convicts mexican trafficker of agent's murder
lines_and_colors: a federal jury on tuesday found a mexican drug trafficker guilty of second degree murder for killing a u.s. border patrol agent by deliberately swerving a truck at him in a dash back to mexico to escape arrest.
